title: Manage all my organisation's claims
I need: to be able to manage all my organisation's claims
So that: I don't spend more time than I need to making and managing claims (and can focus on other tasks).

I need: to check the statuses of my claims
So that: I can monitor the progress of my claims.

I need: to know when payment will be received
So that: I can plan my finances accordingly.

I need: to be notified if an issue arises with any of our claims
So that: I can address the issue promptly.

I need: to identify and select the correct courses
So that: I can quickly start a claim.

title: Save my progress
I need: to be able to save my progress
So that: I can return to it later (for example when I have proof of completion).

I need: to find a claim I've already started
So that: I can continue working on it without starting from scratch.

I need: to save the claim I'm working on even if I haven't finished inputting information
So that: I can avoid losing my progress.

I need: to see when a claim was started and/or last updated
So that: I can track the claim's timeline.

I need: to quickly identify what remains to be done in a partially completed claim
So that: I can complete the claim efficiently.

title: Upload claim evidence
I need: to easily upload claim evidence without the need to duplicate/resubmit
So that: I don't waste time and can focus on my most important duties.

I need: to know precisely what evidence is required
So that: I can prepare and upload the correct documentation.

I need: to provide necessary documentation to support my claim
So that: I can enable effective processing without needing to query evidence.

I need: to see what evidence has already been added to a claim
So that: I can avoid duplication, double check its contents and ensure all required information is included.

title: Understand rejected claims
I need: to understand why a claim I made has been rejected
So that: I can deal with it appropriately.

I need: to know the reason that my claim has been rejected
So that: I can ensure I am addressing the correct rejection issue.

I need: to be able to see the rejected claim
So that: I can compare what I submitted against the rejection reasons.

title: Clear guidance
I need: clear guidance
So that: I can understand who/what is eligible, what to submit and when, and know when I will receive reimbursement.

I need: to know which courses are eligible
So that: I can ensure we only apply for reimbursement for eligible courses.

I need: to know how much we can get reimbursed for each course we send our staff on
So that: I can budget accordingly.

title: Claim flexibility
I need: flexibility in who can start, edit, or submit a claim for my organisation
So that: we don't become stuck if somebody needs to work on a claim that they didn't start.

I need: colleagues to be able to pick up where others have left off
So that: myself and colleagues can collaborate on making claims.

I need: colleagues to be able to submit claims that somebody else has previously worked on
So that: I can avoid duplicating effort and ensure smooth transitions.

I need: to have multiple users within our organisation
So that: I can manage claims collaboratively.

I need: to see who started a claim
So that: I can contact the appropriate person for more information if needed.

title: Manage budget
I need: to see what we've already claimed for and how much budget we have left
So that: we can claim all the money that we are eligible for.

I need: to see how much our organisation has been reimbursed (or applied for reimbursement) this FY and/or the remaining budget
So that: I can track our financials accurately and anticipate potential reimbursement.

title: See expected payments
I need: see when we can expect to be paid
So that: I am able to manage my budget effectively.

I need: to see when we can expect to be paid
So that: I am able to manage my budget effectively.

I need: to have notice of the payment date
So that: I can look out for the payment into my account and know if it hasn't been received.

I need: know which claim the payment relates to
So that: I know whether I have any outstanding claims to be paid.

title: Uniquely identify learners
I need: a way to uniquely identify learners in the service when I may not have unique identifiers myself (e.g. no HR system)
So that: I don't claim for the wrong learner (e.g., two people with the same name).

I need: to uniquely identify learners in the service
So that: I don't claim for the wrong learner (e.g., two people with the same name).

I need: to view info about the learner in addition to their unique identifier
So that: I can double check that I am claiming for the right person.

title: Registering for the service
I need: to be able to register to use the service
So that: we can be set up correctly to start claiming the funding we are eligible for.

I need: to quickly identify our senior responsible officer (SRO)
So that: we can start claiming and receiving funding as soon as possible.

I need: to know how the Grant Determination Letter (GDL) should be signed and submitted to BSA
So that: this can be reviewed by the right people who administer the fund.

I need: to share our organisation’s bank details
So that: we can receive payment for successful claims to the correct account.

I need: to know the eligibility criteria for organisations to join the scheme
So that: I can check we have everything in place before we sign up.

title: Clear evidence requirements
I need: evidence requirements to be clear,
So that: I can judge whether each piece of evidence is acceptable.

I need: evidence requirements to be clear
So that: I can judge whether each piece of evidence is acceptable.

I need: to know which piece of evidence the requirement relates to
So that: I can apply the requirements to the right piece of evidence.

I need: to know where the evidence requirements are listed
So that: I can easily find them when needed.

I need: to easily apply the evidence requirements to the types of evidence provided
So that: I can process claims quickly and in accordance with the Service Level Agreements.

title: Understand previous claim decisions
I need: to know what decisions / actions have previously been made for a claim (either by myself or colleagues)
So that: I can make the most appropriate decision when processing a claim

I need: to know what decisions/actions have previously been made for a claim
So that: I can make the most appropriate decision when processing a claim.

I need: see who has taken a decision or action for a claim
So that: I can ask them if I need further clarification on the decision.

I need: decisions and actions to be date-stamped
So that: I can see the order in which decisions and actions have been made.

I need: to know the rationale behind decisions and actions made
So that: I can understand why their decisions and actions were made.

I need: document my own decisions and actions
So that: future claim processors can understand my reasons for making the decisions and actions.

title: View organisation information
I need: to see information about an organisation,
So that: I can respond to the queries we get

I need: to know what the status is on a claim, including details on any action taken on any claims
So that: I can answer any queries about the claims.

I need: to be able to see all the necessary organisation’s details to complete ID/CV
So that: I can ensure I am only sharing information with the right people.

I need: to be able to quickly log notes centrally after a call
So that: we have an audit trail of queries and actions and me and my colleagues can quickly find the information later.

title: Supporting organisations with registration
I need: to be able to register an organisation
So that: that they can make claims using the service.

I need: to be able to identify eligible organisations who are interested in registering for the scheme
So that: I can contact them to arrange onboarding.

I need: to be able to confirm an organisation is eligible for the scheme
So that: I can ensure only eligible organisations are registered to use the service.

I need: to be able to guide the signatory through the registration process
So that: I can ensure it is successfully completed.

I need: to be able to verify the bank details that have been provided by the organisation
So that: I can ensure they are legitimately linked with the organisation, to prevent fraud .

I need: to be able to edit and re-send an invite to an SRO
So that: I can deal with situations where the invite is not received by the correct person.
